Hi,

All the updates have been completed as requested:
  1. The phone numbers have been removed from the "Coming Soon" stores.
  2. The map for Caringbah has been corrected to show the right location.
  3. The image for Lane Cove has been replaced with the one used for Eastgardens and Turramurra as a placeholder.

Thank you so much for doing that, appreciate it. Apologies, but there's just a couple of more things:

Can you please take the phone number off the coming soon stores? We only put that up when the store is open.

For some reason the map for Caringbah is showing Lane Cove, can you please change this to Caringbah?

Can you please replace the dreadful image for Lane Cove with the image that you've used for Eastgardens and Turramurra? We will supply a new Lane Cove image soon - it's obscured by roadworks at the moment which is why we haven't been able to update.

Thank you so much - Carly

Carly King

Marketing Manager



www.Johnnygiospizza.com.au

Ph: 0403 822 913

E: carly@johnnygiospizza.com.au

Hi,

The updates have been completed as requested:
  • Eastgardens and Turramurra have been reinstated under the "Coming Soon" section on the Our Locations page.
  • The Dee Why image has been straightened up slightly. Let me know if you’d still prefer to provide a new version, and I’ll update it accordingly.

Please feel free to reach out if there’s anything else you'd like adjusted.

Thanks for looking at that.

I can see you've removed Eastgardens and Turramurra altogether, whereas they used to be sitting under a Coming Soon section on the My Locations page, is it possible to re-instate that please?

And sorry to be really pedantic, but is it possible to straighten the Dee Why image up a fraction? The whole image looks like it is leaning backwards a fraction. Let me know if it's a problems and I can re-supply the image.

Thanks for your help - cheers, Carly

Carly King

Marketing Manager



www.Johnnygiospizza.com.au

Ph: 0403 822 913

E: carly@johnnygiospizza.com.au

EASTGARDENS opens 5pm Tuesday 26 November
TURRAMURRA opens 5pm Tuesday 17 December

push to live on these dates
You're amazing - thank you so much!

Hi,

Got it—I'll schedule the store opening updates to go live on the specified dates, ideally around midday but no later than 5pm as requested. I’ll also crop the Five Dock and Caringbah images a bit closer for you.
Please let me know if there are any other adjustments or details you’d like me to consider.

Hi Glen, thanks for this - very efficient, thank you - but a bit too efficient!

I was briefing the store opening details ahead of their actual opening, but we can't have their details live on the site until the day of opening ie perfect would be about midday on the day they open, and not later than 5pm. Those dates are in red below. Would you mind implementing those updates closer to the opening dates please?

Re the new store photographs, they look great. Do you mind cropping in a bit closer on the Five Dock and Caringbah images please?

Thanks for your help! Cheers - Carly
